title: Emote in the Store? PBE servers.
body:
Right so I have a PBE account and i saw on the store that there is a new tab on the store saying "Emote".

Anyone have any clue as to that this means?
Or a link to where I can find out?
 Link is to a ScreenCap of it. i modified it slightly to keep my PBE anonymous and highlighted the important stuff.

replies.body: Heeeeeey that's new! Honestly, we don't do much troubleshooting for the PBE client on this board, so that's actually a bit of new info for me as well. I'm going to reach out to a few people to see if I can get more details on that for you though!

hey thanks man its weird and i really want to know more about it.       


{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I hope it's related to IP, seeing as the rune change will make IP worthless until they add something new. Rip my 360+ rune collection, hello something new to spend IP on?
i do too and rip your collection XD
yeah I have that on my pbe account too. I have no clue what it is
